column5: Heading up Friday/Saturday with my 11 and 7 yo. Any reports or helpful hints on what to use to put fish in the boat? Any fish really. I am more used to fishing Canada in September. thanks

On the main lake the water temp is hovering around 62 degrees. Walleye fishing is solid, bass are still spawning in a few areas and the pike fishing is still consistent. This was near Kenora as of last Friday. I also pulled the 14day weather yesterday and it showed Mid 70.s for highs so I would expect fish to be on the move.We leave in a couple weeks so please send a report when you get back.Good luck
If the wind is blowing, find some narrows and fish vertically, jig and minnow, tubes. Bill.
